title: !bot
message: This Gnome-bot, a chat bot made for Csethiroth out of spite. Check it out here: https://github.com/Sloansta/gnome-bot

title: !info
message: Hey my name is Cseth and I stream Minecraft and league of legends.

title: !schedule
message: I don't have a set schedule but I usually get on at after 19:00 GMT every other day. Feel free to tune in :)

title: !points
message: Use ;points to check how many points you have, or ;points <user> to see how many an other user has.
